meanings.definition: An upward trend or movement in a market or stock prices.
meanings.sent1: The uptrend in the stock market brought smiles to investors.
meanings.sent2: The uptrend of the graph showed a positive growth pattern.
meanings.sent3: The uptrend in ice cream sales during winter was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her career took an uptrend after she started networking more.
meanings.sent5: The uptrend in online shopping has changed the retail landscape.

meanings.sent1: The airplane began to uptrend towards the clouds.
meanings.sent2: His popularity started to uptrend after the release of his new song.
meanings.sent3: The balloon uptrended gracefully in the sky before slowly descending.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence uptrended as she practiced public speaking more.
meanings.sent5: The company's profits uptrended steadily over the past year.
